name: Duplex
description:
Duplex is a game project made during the course "Making Games" during the fall semester of 2020 at the IT University of Copenhagen by a four person team. The game takes place primarily in an office where you as the player have to find puzzles in the 3D office space. These sequential puzzles are solved in a 2D point and click style. Along the way the player might read notices or emails to try and gain a better understanding of how it is to work in this office and what is going on in the puzzles.

The game is playable only on Windows using mouse and keyboard.
